title: Corpus-based Learning of Analogies and Semantic Relations

tldr.text: An algorithm for learning from unlabeled text that can solve verbal analogy questions of the kind found in the SAT college entrance exam and is state-of-the-art for both verbal analogies and noun-modifier relations is presented.
